.calendar {
  border: 1px solid var(--grey-3);
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 28px 26px 32px 26px;

  min-width: 150px;
}

.calendar__title {
  color: var(--calendarText);
  font-family: Inter;
  font-size: 20px;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 24px;
  text-align: center;
  margin: 0;
  margin-bottom: 24px;
}

.calendar__wrapper {
  padding-bottom: 100%;
  position: relative;
}

.calendar__container {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  right: 0;

  display: grid;
  grid-template: repeat(7, 1fr) / repeat(7, 1fr);
}

.calendar__cell {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;

  color: var(--calendarText);
  font-family: 'source-sans-pro', sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 20px;
}
/* модификаторы */
.calendar__cell_header {
  color: var(--calendarCellHeader);
  font-family: Inter;
  font-size: 14px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}
.calendar__cell_extreme_value {
  background: var(--primary);
  color: var(--white);
}
.calendar__cell_range {
  background: var(--calendarCellRange);
}

.calendar_preview {
  width: 50%;
}

.calendar_page {
  min-width: 50%;
  align-self: center;
}
